TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InvalidCastException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 無效的轉型或明確轉換所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown for invalid casting or explicit conversion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 支援自動轉換為其基底類型，再回復成衍生的型別，衍生的型別以及呈現介面的物件，並傳回介面的類型。The .NET Framework supports automatic conversion from derived types to their base types and back to the derived type, as well as from types that present interfaces to interface objects and back. 它也包含各種不同的機制，可支援自訂的轉換。It also includes a variety of mechanisms that support custom conversions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的型別轉換](~/docs/standard/base-types/type-conversion.md)。For more information, see [Type Conversion in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/type-conversion.md). 不支援一種類型的執行個體轉換為另一種類型時擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown when the conversion of an instance of one type to another type is not supported. 例如，嘗試轉換值加入值都會擲回例外狀況。For example, attempting to convert a value to a value throws an exception. 不同於支援到另一種類型的轉換，但來源類型的值超出目標類型的範圍時擲回例外狀況。It differs from an exception, which is thrown when a conversion of one type to another is supported, but the value of the source type is outside the range of the target type. 例外狀況由開發人員錯誤所造成，並不會處理在`try/catch`封鎖; 相反地，應該排除造成例外狀況。An exception is caused by developer error and should not be handled in a `try/catch` block; instead, the cause of the exception should be eliminated. 如需系統所支援的轉換資訊，請參閱類別。For information about conversions supported by the system, see the class. 是否有錯誤時所發生的目的型別可以儲存來源型別值，但不是大型足以儲存特定的來源值，請參閱例外狀況。For errors that occur when the destination type can store source type values, but is not large enough to store a specific source value, see the exception. > [!NOTE] > 在許多情況下，語言編譯器會偵測任何轉換的來源類型與目標型別之間不存在，並會發出編譯器錯誤。In many cases, your language compiler detects that no conversion exists between the source type and the target type and issues a compiler error. 某些條件下嘗試的轉換會擲回例外狀況會在下列各節中討論：Some of the conditions under which an attempted conversion throws an exception are discussed in the following sections: [基本型別和 IConvertible](#Primitive) [Primitive types and IConvertible](#Primitive) [Convert.ChangeType 方法](#ChangeType) [The Convert.ChangeType method](#ChangeType) [縮小轉換和 IConvertible 實作](#Narrowing) [Narrowing conversions and IConvertible implementations](#Narrowing) [向下轉型](#Downcasting) [Downcasting](#Downcasting) [從介面物件的轉換](#Interface) [Conversion from an interface object](#Interface) [字串轉換](#String) [String conversions](#String) [Visual Basic 6.0 移轉Visual Basic 6.0 migration](#Migration) 來源值必須是明確參考轉換成功， `null`，或是來源引數所參考的物件型別必須轉換成目的地類型的隱含參考轉換。For an explicit reference conversion to be successful, the source value must be `null`, or the object type referenced by the source argument must be convertible to the destination type by an implicit reference conversion. 下列中繼語言 (IL) 指示會擲回例外狀況：The following intermediate language (IL) instructions throw an exception: - `castclass` - `refanyval` - `unbox` 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDCAST，其值 0x80004002。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDCAST, which has the value 0x80004002. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## 基本型別和 IConvertiblePrimitive types and IConvertible 您直接或間接呼叫基本型別實作不支援特定的轉換。You directly or indirectly call a primitive type's implementation that does not support a particular conversion. 例如，嘗試轉換值或值就會擲回例外狀況。For example, trying to convert a value to a or a value to an throws an exception. 下列範例會呼叫這兩並方法，將轉換值。The following example calls both the and methods to convert a value to a . 在這兩種情況下，方法呼叫會擲回例外狀況。In both cases, the method call throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/iconvertible1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.InvalidCastException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/vb/iconvertible1.vb#2)] 支援的轉換，因為沒有任何因應措施。Because the conversion is not supported, there is no workaround. ## Convert.ChangeType 方法The Convert.ChangeType method 您呼叫了未實作方法，將物件轉換到另一個型別，但一或兩個類型從介面。You've called the method to convert an object from one type to another, but one or both types don't implement the interface. 在大部分情況下，支援的轉換，因為沒有任何因應措施。In most cases, because the conversion is not supported, there is no workaround. 在某些情況下，可能的因應措施是手動指派屬性值從來源類型的類似屬性的目標型別。In some cases, a possible workaround is to manually assign property values from the source type to similar properties of a the target type. ## 縮小轉換和 IConvertible 實作Narrowing conversions and IConvertible implementations 縮小運算子定義類型所支援的明確轉換。Narrowing operators define the explicit conversions supported by a type. 在 C# 中的轉型運算子或`CType`在 Visual Basic 中的轉換方法 (如果`Option Strict`上)，才能執行轉換。A casting operator in C# or the `CType` conversion method in Visual Basic (if `Option Strict` is on) is required to perform the conversion. 不過，如果不將來源型別，也不目標型別定義的明確或縮小的兩個類型之間的轉換和的一個或兩種類型的實作不支援從來源類型轉換成目標型別擲回例外狀況。However, if neither the source type nor the target type defines an explicit or narrowing conversion between the two types, and the implementation of one or both types doesn't support a conversion from the source type to the target type, an exception is thrown. 在大部分情況下，支援的轉換，因為沒有任何因應措施。In most cases, because the conversion is not supported, there is no workaround. ## 向下轉型Downcasting 您可以向下轉型，也就是嘗試將基底類型的執行個體轉換成其中一種其衍生的類型。You are downcasting, that is, trying to convert an instance of a base type to one of its derived types. 在下列範例中，再嘗試轉換`Person`物件至`PersonWithID`物件失敗。In the following example, trying to convert a `Person` object to a `PersonWithID` object fails. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/basetoderived1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.InvalidCastException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/vb/basetoderived1.vb#1)] 如範例所示，向下轉型成功才`Person`向上轉型從建立物件`PersonWithId`物件`Person`物件，或如果`Person`物件`null`。As the example shows, the downcast succeeds only if the `Person` object was created by an upcast from a `PersonWithId` object to a `Person` object, or if the `Person` object is `null`. ## 從介面物件的轉換Conversion from an interface object 您嘗試將介面物件轉換為型別會實作該介面，但目標型別不是相同的型別或型別從其原始衍生的介面物件的基底類別。You are attempting to convert an interface object to a type that implements that interface, but the target type is not the same type or a base class of the type from which the interface object was originally derived. 下列範例會擲回它會嘗試轉換時發生的例外狀況物件到物件。The following example throws an exception when it attempts to convert an object to a object. 轉換會失敗，因為雖然類別會實作介面物件無關類別衍生的介面物件。The conversion fails because although the class implements the interface, the object is not related to the class from which the interface object was derived. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/Interface1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.InvalidCastException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/vb/Interface1.vb#3)] 為例外狀況訊息指出，轉換會成功，在此情況下的介面物件轉換回原始類型的執行個體時，才。As the exception message indicates, the conversion would succeed only if the interface object is converted back to an instance of the original type, in this case a . 如果介面物件轉換成原始類型的基底類型的執行個體，也會成功轉換。The conversion would also succeed if the interface object is converted to an instance of a base type of the original type. ## 字串轉換String conversions 您嘗試為其字串表示轉換值或物件，在 C# 中使用轉型運算子。You are trying to convert a value or an object to its string representation by using a casting operator in C#. 在下列範例中，這兩個嘗試轉型值的字串，並嘗試將轉換的字串擲回整數例外狀況。In the following example, both the attempt to cast a value to a string and the attempt to cast an integer to a string throw an exception. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/ToString1.cs#4)] > [!NOTE] > 使用 Visual Basic`CStr`運算子，將基本類型的值轉換成字串成功。Using the Visual Basic `CStr` operator to convert a value of a primitive type to a string succeeds. 此作業不會擲回例外狀況。The operation does not throw an exception. 已成功轉換為其字串表示的任何類型的執行個體，呼叫其`ToString`方法，如下列範例會執行。To successfully covert an instance of any type to its string representation, call its `ToString` method, as the following example does. `ToString`方法，則一律存在，因為方法由定義類別，因此繼承或覆寫所有的 managed 型別。The `ToString` method is always present, since the method is defined by the class and therefore is either inherited or overridden by all managed types. [!code-csharp[System.InvalidCastException#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.invalidcastexception/cs/ToString2.cs#5)] ## Visual Basic 6.0 移轉Visual Basic 6.0 migration 您要升級 Visual Basic.NET、 Visual Basic 6.0 應用程式中的使用者控制項的自訂事件的呼叫和例外狀況會擲回訊息: 「 指定的轉換無效。 」You're upgrading a Visual Basic 6.0 application with a call to a custom event in a user control to Visual Basic .NET, and an exception is thrown with the message, "Specified cast is not valid." 若要消除此例外狀況，變更您的表單中的程式碼行 (例如`Form1`)To eliminate this exception, change the line of code in your form (such as `Form1`) ``` Call UserControl11_MyCustomEvent(UserControl11, New UserControl1.MyCustomEventEventArgs(5)) ``` 並以下列程式碼行取代：and replace it with the following line of code: ``` Call UserControl11_MyCustomEvent(UserControl11(0), New UserControl1.MyCustomEventEventArgs(5)) ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 無法轉換從來源類型的目的型別。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Cannot cast from source type to destination type." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新的例外狀況使用`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值會傳遞至建構函式，或傳回`null`如果不提供內部例外狀況值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or returns `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, int32 errorCode) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, errorCode As Integer)

param.name: message
param.span: 訊息，指出例外狀況發生的原因。

span.span: The message that indicates the reason the exception occurred.

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 與這個例外狀況相關聯的錯誤碼 (HRESULT) 值。

span.span: The error code (HRESULT) value associated with the exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的訊息和錯誤碼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message and error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新的例外狀況使用`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 這個建構函式提供 HRESULT 值繼承者可以存取類別，透過受保護屬性類別。This constructor supplies an HRESULT value that is accessible to inheritors of the class, via the protected property of the class. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|
